dialogue.text: 王淑娟Hello, 高雄市Police: Your son-in-law was arrested for prostitution yesterday. Pay 20,000元 bail now.
What? Are you sure it's really my son-in-law? This must be a mistake!
Yes, ma'am. We have records and witnesses. You must pay 20,000元 quickly to avoid worse consequences.
Alright, please tell me how I can pay the bail immediately to resolve this.
